ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Mage Focus Items
ygData.msgSnippet: I wonder the same thing I have a level 30 mage and know there are not alligators in Cazic. Hoping others jump on this thread....... ...
ygData.messageBody:
I wonder the same thing I have a level 30 mage and
know there are not alligators in Cazic.

Hoping others jump on this thread.......



--- Steven Hulse <steveh@...> wrote:
> Hi everyone!
>
> I'm getting ready to work on my Mage Focus Items
> specifically the Shovel Of Ponz and the Torch Of
> Alna. According to the info I have found, for the
> SoP I need to get a shovel off an alligator in Cazic
> Thule. However CT no longer has the gator there,
> they have been moved. My question is after the move
> to their new location do they still drop a shovel?
>
> The Torch of Alna requires a torch off of a Mage in
> Najena. I tried to find this mage but didn't have
> much luck. Has anyone done this? Also the info I
> have says the torch also drops off of an alligator?
> Is this true?
>
> I'm just trying to clear up some confusion so I may
> get started on this personal quest.
>
> Thanks!
> Shizney
> lvl~14 Gnome Mage
>
> --
>
